Campaigns

Get involved

Edgeryders is a social enterprise, and an open and distributed think tank of people working through an online social network and a series of conferences. We're looking for people on paths of radical discovery at the edge of their professions and industries.. Whether it be social policy, technology, healthcare, public services or the private domain — we would like to know more about you and how you might want to participitate in our events, community meetings, conferences and publications.

What's your field?

We don't expect you to fit into any one category, but if you were to best describe your area of expertise, what would it be? If none are listed below, choose the 'other' option and describe it in the form below.

Domain Expert

Policymaker & Voter

Tech Insider

Investor

?

Other

Tell us a bit about yourself

If you’d like to learn how to plug into our work directly please let us know more about yourself below. We’ll review your background and do our best to connect you with the most appropriate projects happening in our network.

Please provide 2-4 sentences about your life experience as it relates to your domain, or anything else you would like to add. (Optional)

Would you like to receive occasional updates?
